main.name: Shakh Jalilov
main.description: I specialize in creating responsive, scalable web applications.
main.bio: Hi there! I am Shakh Jalilov, a Front End Developer with several years of industry experience. I am passionate about building and optimizing user-focused websites for continuous improvement and deployment. My expertise includes HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and other modern frameworks. I've successfully launched projects, consistently optimized performance, and collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative solutions.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to reach out for collaboration or inquiries!

education.description: Focused on developing strong programming and software development skills with a focus on modern web technologies.
